trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Morgantown
There were no other sightings in Morgantown on or around June 23rd 2012
divs: Sighting Detailsthat evening we went outside to observe the ISS fly over at 9:59 when we saw the reddish orange object.
Summary: from my deck looking south east observed a yellow red orange circular shape move across the sky toward the south and diminish in size until it was gone. afterwards it left a high wide con trail that dispersed in 5 min. no strobe or navigation lights
